data.name: Flight of the Amazon Queen 25th Anniversary - Extras
data.detailed_description:
Extras Pack for "Flight of the Amazon Queen: 25th Anniversary Edition":

  • Original Midi Soundtrack (separate soundtrack DLC available for MP3 version)
  • Interview Mini-Game featurette with Audio Commentary by Game Creator
  • Playing Guide
  • "The Making of" booklet
  • Original Manual
  • Art Book.

fullgame.name: Flight of the Amazon Queen: 25th Anniversary Edition

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Mac 1.8 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel 1.8 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
